WSUS31 KKCI 180655 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 30E 
VALID UNTIL 0855Z 
FL AND CSTL WTRS 
FROM 40SSW TLH-40WSW CTY-70WSW PIE-210SE LEV-40SSW TLH 
AREA TS MOV FROM 21025KT. TOPS TO FL440. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 180855-181255 
AREA 1...FROM 70ENE ORF-160SE SIE-170ESE ECG-140SSE ILM-210ENE 
OMN-140SE CHS-80E CHS-ECG-70ENE ORF 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. REFER 
TO MOST RECENT WTNT21 KNHC FROM NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER FOR 
DETAILS ON TROPICAL STORM ARTHUR. 
 
AREA 2...FROM ROD-HMV-30NE AMG-40NW CTY-PIE-90WSW SRQ-200ESE 
LEV-30E PXV-40ENE IND-ROD 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

WSUS31 KKCI 180655

VALID UNTIL 0855Z

40ESE MCN 
ISOL TS D30 MOV FROM 23015KT. TOPS TO FL360. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 180855-181255 
AREA 1...FROM 70ENE ORF-160SE SIE-170ESE ECG-140SSE ILM-210ENE 
OMN-140SE CHS-80E CHS-ECG-70ENE ORF 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. REFER 
TO MOST RECENT WTNT21 KNHC FROM NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER FOR 
DETAILS ON TROPICAL STORM ARTHUR. 
 
AREA 2...FROM ROD-HMV-30NE AMG-40NW CTY-PIE-90WSW SRQ-200ESE 
LEV-30E PXV-40ENE IND-ROD 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==
